A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Ok\, this movie was entertaining enough and great to look at\, but it defecated all over the characters and set-up that preceded it. I’m all for originality and a unique take\, but not at the cost of feeling crappy when you leave the theatre. What they did with Luke was a travesty\, and I could fly a star destroyer through the plot holes. The humor was forced and awkward\, and it was all very un-Star Wars like.
